  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_86899</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Coupe transversale de la Terre</string>
            <string language="en">Cross-section of the Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Querschnitt der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cross-section da terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sezione trasversale della terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διατομή της γης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sección representativa de la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme illustre une coupe transversale de la Terre se composant de la croûte, du magma, du noyau intérieur plein et du noyau externe fondu.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates a cross-section of the Earth consisting of crust, magma, solid inner core and molten outer core.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croûte</string>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">noyau intérieur</string>
            <string language="en">inner core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">magma</string>
            <string language="en">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roche fondue</string>
            <string language="en">molten rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">noyau  externe</string>
            <string language="en">outer core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roche solide</string>
            <string language="en">solid rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht einen Querschnitt
der Masse, die aus Kruste, Magma, festem innerem Kern und flüssigem 
äußerem Kern besteht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra um cross-section da crosta 
consistindo da terra, do magma, do núcleo interno contínuo e do 
núcleo exterior derretido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra una sezione trasversale 
della crosta consistente della terra, del magma, del nucleo interno 
solido e del nucleo esterno fuso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί μια διατομή της γης που 
αποτελείται από την κρούστα, το μάγμα, το στερεό εσωτερικό 
πυρήνα και το λειωμένο εξωτερικό πυρήνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra una sección representativa
de la corteza que consiste en de la tierra, del magma, de la base 
interna sólida y de la base externa fundida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kruste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">innerer Kern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">flüssiger Felsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">äußerer Kern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">crosta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">núcleo interno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rocha derretida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">núcleo exterior</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rocha contínua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">crosta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nucleo interno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">roccia fusa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">roccia compatta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κρούστα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εσωτερικός πυρήνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μάγμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λειωμένος βράχος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξωτερικός πυρήνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
